data.name: Ardor - Support the Dev!
data.detailed_description:
This DLC does not add anything to the game

Ardor is free because my goal for it is focused on more people playing and enjoying it, not on making money.
However, the time I can spend on it is limited by working a full time job. Supporting development helps me tremendously and also helps enable more content to be made!
I'm very grateful for any support, and am excited to keep making games!
